TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ZLibStream extends System.IO.Stream
Public NotInheritable Class ZLibStream Inherits Stream
public ref class ZLibStream sealed : System::IO::Stream

Docs.summary: Provides methods and properties used to compress and decompress streams by using the zlib data format specification.

Docs.param: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The size of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero.

Docs.exception: The stream does not support writing.

Docs.param: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The size, in bytes, of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size and cancellation token.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
Docs.exception: The stream does not support reading or writing.
Only one asynchronous reader or writer is allowed at a time.
